name: calculate_compound_interest
description: Calculates the future value of an investment using the compound interest formula.

annual_rate.description: The annual interest rate as a decimal (e.g., 0.05 for 5%).

years.description: The number of years the money is invested.

compounds_per_year.description: The number of times interest is compounded per year. Defaults to 1.

precision.description: The number of decimal places to round the result. Defaults to 2.
